description:
Ranked #1 Entertainment in 38 countries
THANK YOU!

Trollolol is an endless source of fun. The app is capable of detecting faces on pictures and swapping them with a hilarious variety of rage faces.

No need to position & zoom the faces, everything is automatic - and the result is guaranteed to make you laugh. Not satisfied with the result? You are able to edit the image by scaling, flipping, rotating or changing the rageface.

You can either modify pictures from your library or snap a photo and transform it immediately.

Send the result in email, or save it to your library!

Note that Trollolol will give best results if not used on close-up portraits, and the subject is facing the camera.

What users are derping:

"At first, I was like herp derp le herp. Then I scanned a picture of my face and it made me forever alone. Truly Derp this app is. Truly Derp."

"This app - Is full of win"

"My life now has meaning - Nao I can share rageface with my lived ones.......wait, empty contacts...FOREVER ALONE! D:"

"it made me herp my derp"

"Herp - This app made me involuntarily disengage my bowels."

"Wonderful - One of the most amazing and life changing apps on le appstore. It made me laugh, it made me cry. I was emotionally touched by this app. A must download for everybody."

Follow us on twitter: http://twitter.com/yombasoft

Or Facebook:
http://facebook.com/yomba.trollolol
